scripts.fetch:binance-futures: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=BINANCEFUTURES node --es-module-specifier-resolution=node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:binance: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=BINANCE node --es-module-specifier-resolution=node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:binanceus: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=BINANCEUS node --es-module-specifier-resolution=node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:ftx: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=FTX node --es-module-specifier-resolution=node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:coinbase: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=COINBASE node --es-module-specifier-resolution=node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.fetch:bittrex: npx tsc && npx cross-env EXCHANGE=BITTREX node --es-module-specifier-resolution=node -r source-map-support/register dist/fetch-pairs.js
scripts.add-alerts: npx tsc && npx cross-env node --es-module-specifier-resolution=node -r source-map-support/register dist/add-alerts.js
